title: Devfolio
description: A personal portfolio built to showcase my web development skills, projects, and experiences. This dynamic and responsive site uses modern web technologies to offer an engaging user experience. Features include a dark mode toggle, smooth scrolling, project grids and animated transitions.

title: 3D Model Viewer
description: A clean, lightweight Laravel-based WebGL project to upload, view, and interact with .obj, .mtl, .gltf, .glb, .dae 3D models directly in the browser. Built with clean, extensible code and jQuery for front-end handling, it features zoom, pan, and rotate controls, lighting and shading, persistent camera memory, and Docker support for full portability. Ideal for learning and demonstrating 3D rendering with PHP backend integration.

title: Vehicle API
description: A robust Laravel-based API project for managing different types of vehicles including cars, motorcycles, and trucks. Built with clean architecture principles, it features soft deletes, advanced filtering, dynamic pagination, OpenAPI (Swagger) documentation, and unit testing. Designed with scalability and maintainability in mind.

title: Product API
description: Laravel REST API for managing products across categories like books, fashion, and music. This project supports dynamic pagination, random data generation for testing. Built with focus on flexibility, performance, and extensibility.
